infotexts.jobdescription.officer: The officer is the second in command aboard the sub and normally pilots or takes charge of the crew during missions.
infotexts.jobdescription.officer1: Crew Chiefs make sure everything on the sub is running smoothly and efficiently.
infotexts.jobdescription.officer2: Enforcers are normally battle hardened security officer's promoted to make sure law and order is maintained no matter the cost.
infotexts.jobdescription.officer3: The Executive Officer otherwise known as the XO is a senior officer about to become a captain. They know how to command both a security or maintanence team effectively.
infotexts.jobdescription.scientist: Science personnel are responsible for researching the various wildlife and ecosystems of Europa along with making chemicals that are used for all sorts of problems.
infotexts.jobdescription.scientist1: Biochemists specialize in making the chemicals needed for onboard experiments and in a pinch make deadly neurotoxins that even the largest beast can't stand up to
infotexts.jobdescription.scientist2: Xenobiologists study the Europan ecosystem and wildlife to gain a greater understanding of Humanities new home.
infotexts.jobdescription.cook: Cooks are responsible for keeping the crews bellies full and act as the janitor aboard the sub.
infotexts.entitydescription.plasticbag: It's commonly found inside cargo crates. Usually used to carry small items but sometimes used in other, questionable activities.
infotexts.entitydescription.revolverround2: Custom hand-loaded revolver ammunition. More stopping power but less penetration.
infotexts.entitydescription.flashbang: A non-lethal explosive designed to disorient targets instead of killing them.
infotexts.entitydescription.breachbomb: A high explosive charge with a small blast radius designed to punch a hole in hulls.
infotexts.entitydescription.coldbomb: A non-lethal explosive based on liquid oxygenite.
infotexts.entitydescription.shockcharge: An electronic device designed to release an electric discharge when triggered.
infotexts.entitydescription.flakbomb: A submarine anti-creature payload designed to deal damage to one or more targets with both explosive power and dispersed lethal fragments.
infotexts.entitydescription.uraniumbomb: One of the most powerful payloads available for submarine munition shells.
infotexts.entitydescription.thoriumbomb: One of the most powerful payloads available for submarine munition shells.
infotexts.entitydescription.incendiumbomb: One of the most powerful payloads available for submarine munition shells.
infotexts.entitydescription.fulguriumbomb: One of the most powerful payloads available for submarine munition shells.
infotexts.entitydescription.commandersjacket: A jacket to show your status as a senior officer.
infotexts.entitydescription.officersberet: A token of the officer's questionable authority.
infotexts.entitydescription.fryingpan: A iron Frying Pan used to cook food
infotexts.entitydescription.hydrogengenerator: A generator that produces hydrogen gas
